tool_description: Generate and validate time-based one-time passwords (TOTP) for your second factor authentication (2FA) scenario using Microsoft Authenticator app
name: Microsoft Authenticator
title: Microsoft Authenticator

api_list.name: enroll
api_list.description: Step 2. Generate QR code and enroll using Google Authenticator app

api_list.name: new_v2
api_list.description:
Step 1. Generate new secret 

nb! This is the absolutely the same as the /new/, the only difference is that here we omit the return message "Your new secret: ", which makes it a little easier to parse the results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microsoft-authenticator.p.rapidapi.com/new_v2/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microsoft-authenticator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
